participant_1.name: Isabella
participant_1.personality: creative and adventurous, enjoys exploring new cultures and cuisines.
participant_1.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i am an art major in college.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: ambitious and determined, with a deep love for nature and animals.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.

content.text: i want to be a lawyer
